title: Prescribing Amiodarone: An Evidence-Based Review of Clinical Indications
reference: Vassallo, P., & Trohman, R. G. (2007). Prescribing amiodarone: An evidence-based review of clinical indications. JAMA, 298(11), 1312-1322. https://doi.org/10.1001/jama.298.11.1312
